Detailed Description

This base class is an object that can own properties.

bool PropertyOwnerBase::changeOwnedProperty ( PyObjectPtr &  rpOldValue,
PyObject *  pNewValue,
DataType &  dataType,
int  index 
)

This method modifies a property owned by this object.

Parameters:
rpOldValue A reference that will be populated with the old value.
pNewValue The new value to set the property to.
dataType The type of the property being changed.
index The index of the property being changed.

virtual PropertyOwnerBase* PropertyOwnerBase::getChildPropertyOwner ( int  childIndex  )  const [pure virtual]

This method returns the child PropertyOwner of this PropertyOwner.

If the child property is not a PropertyOwner, NULL is returned.

Parameters:
childIndex The index of the child to get.

Implemented in SimpleClientEntity::EntityPropertyOwner, PyArrayDataInstance, PyClassDataInstance, PyFixedDictDataInstance, and PropertyOwnerLink< C >.

PropertyOwnerBase *&  rpTopLevelOwner

virtual void PropertyOwnerBase::onOwnedPropertyChanged ( PropertyChange &  change  )  [inline, virtual]

This method is called by a child PropertyOwnerBase to inform us that a property has changed.

Each PropertyOwner should pass this to their parent, adding their index to the path, until the Entity is reached.

Reimplemented in SimpleClientEntity::EntityPropertyOwner, and PropertyOwnerLink< C >.

virtual PyObjectPtr PropertyOwnerBase::setOwnedProperty ( int  childIndex,
BinaryIStream &  data 
) [pure virtual]

This method sets a child property to a new value.

Parameters:
childIndex The index of the child property to change.
data A stream containing the new value.
Returns:
The previous value of the property.

Implemented in SimpleClientEntity::EntityPropertyOwner, PyArrayDataInstance, PyClassDataInstance, PyFixedDictDataInstance, and PropertyOwnerLink< C >.

virtual PyObjectPtr PropertyOwnerBase::setOwnedSlice ( int  startIndex,
int  endIndex,
BinaryIStream &  data 
) [inline, virtual]

This method modifies a slice of an array property.

Parameters:
startIndex The start index of the slice to replace.
endIndex One greater than the end index of the slice to replace.
data A stream containing the new values.

Reimplemented in PyArrayDataInstance.
